original_text:
I will cut off the ruler from its midst,
    and will kill all its princes with him,”
says the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 그 중에서 재판장을 멸하며 지도자들을 그와 함께 죽이리라 여호와께서 말씀하시니라

sentences.original_text: I will cut off the ruler from its midst
and will kill all its princes with him
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그와 함께 그 모든 고관들을 죽이리라
